file_content.text: The Empire will never see the likes of my men in their ranks. Glad you've done right by them.
The power station's been taken offline.
Yeah? How many Imperials were caught in the explosion? Ten? Twenty? A hundred?
No, no, it doesn't matter. Mission's over, what's done is done. Thank you.
Now if you'll excuse me, I'm going to drown myself in some good Corellian ale.
I'm not leaving until that power station's a pile of rubble.
"Unhinged." Do I look unhinged to you?
Not like I'm the first commander to see his men butchered by some drooling lunatics. Can't blame crazies for acting crazy.
As for those motherless Imperials who freed them--of course I want to blow them up! They're the enemy!
Go into battle looking for revenge and you'll only lose more troops.
Don't do anything rash.
Joke's on you, then. I don't have any more men to lose.
Careful, Major. Violence and anger are a dangerous combination.
Calm yourself.
Not everyone can mow down their enemies with a smile, Jedi.
Your top priority should be securing this prison, not settling your grudges.
Remember your mission.
I know my duties, same as you.
Uh-huh. Now how about you hand over that detonator, nice and easy....
Whatever you say, weirdo.
Oh, come off it. I'm not crazy.
I'm sorry to hear about your men.
Losing friends is never easy.
Fine soldiers, every one of them. A few could've made general someday. Just isn't right.
Go for it.
Too bad Command doesn't think I'm fit for combat. Afraid I'll do something crazy.
What I'm proposing is simple, effective and completely impersonal. Empire's commandeered a nearby power station. I wanna bury them in it.
Got enough detonite here to reduce the main generator to a stain. Just need someone "mentally sound" to set the charges.
If you say so.
It's a perfectly legitimate op, promise.
That seems excessive.
Empire's dug in deeper than a sand tick. Already lost enough good men. Not about to lose more.
You'll have to blast through the station's outer walls and destroy the security consoles before you can access the main generator.
From there, it's just a matter of rigging the generator, getting clear and enjoying the show. Good luck to you.
No way. [Refuse quest]
Mark my words, I will see that power station destroyed!
Half a kilo will vaporize six Imperials, so if I've got thirty-seven kilos of detonite, that's....
